author: HaroldE Dickinson
comment: I'm not so impressed about it. If I wanted to know other Gmail app I would have stayed with them. The only thing upsetting is I can't get this thing out of my tablet! Every time I go to set up another email app this thing keeps on coming up like a virus! I'm very upset with this! Now all I have to do is my homework, and then I can get rid of this silly app once and for all! I don't advise using this!

author: John Evans
comment: They've made a big mistake with the latest update!! They've changed it to group by time (days, months), and it has ruined it!! No option to turn it off either. Please give and option to turn it off! Means my inbox is much bigger (and less manageable)  than before. Hate it! Considering moving onto another app.

author: Sam B
comment: App will sync your emails sometimes only after restarting it. It will never let me download attachments and most of the time sent emails will just sit in the outbox without sending. Almost useless.

author: Kevin Johnson
comment: Had problems with this app initially but it is still lacking one major piece.  Tasks should be integrated with this app!!  Its disappointing to not have this tool integrated to work on the fly.

author: Dustin Lagrange
comment: Often will not sync the inbox, even after pulling down, just loads forever. No calendar month view. Can't sync calendar with Android system as old app allowed. Calendar colors completely unstable and do not match OWA, W10 Mail app or Outlook. Can't select folders to sync, can't select amount of mail to sync. Inbox is slow to update or does not update when notifications for new mail display, therefore you can not read the new mail. No Group calendar support.

No search in calendar, no email count notification on icon, contact view needs a right edge abcdef.... for faster scrolling as the search of contacts is too slow.  Does integrate with Cortana.   Guess MS will get it right in a few more iterations.  Right now it is poor beta software.
It's good, so much better than type straight in the browser, easy to use, some people should be thankfull instead of coming to  say sh.. for things they don't pay.

author: William Franks
comment: Overall it's a more than good app. First problem I found with it is that it crashes the phone and causes it to restart when you use the search function and sift through emails.

Excellent app.  So one thing I would like to see added is the ability to have not just one of the parts of the application open but the others as well. I would like to be able, for example, to have separate instances of mail and people rather than just one or the other.

author: Paul Dhillon
comment: Now it works very badly with Gmail. Tried reinstalling no change. Need to use Gmail app in parallel. Simple to use. If the file manager could show thumbnails I could get rid of my drive apps.

author: Kate Ratcliffe
comment: Great free app. Easy to use. Easy to find emails with the new grouping of days, weeks etc. Would like the option to delete email folders from this app, even if they are deleted via desktop the app keeps them. Other that it's great!

author: Michael Rogers
comment: Updated yesterday, now tons of old emails shoiw as unread. Tried to do a "Select all" and then "Mark as read", and they still show as new, unread messages. Need this function fixed since your "update/improvement" broke it.

author: Roger Laramee
comment: Since last update,  hotmail display sender and subject title but not email body text. Maybe new outlook hotmail is not compatible with old android OS of tablet

author: Zach Aspden
comment: Add the ability to delete emails within the notification bar without having to go into the email itself, only options are to archive??? At least have the option to change settings for the notification bar.

author: Jimi Rockley
comment: I would give this a 5 as it's been a core tool for my job for years. However, the most recent update no longer shows notifications of new email or calendar alerts. I only realised after missing a few important emails. I think I ugh it was my server settings but it's definitely the app. Please investigate.

The latest update is terrible, it now groups email by dates which makes the inbox far bigger than it should. I turn this off on my desktop view, why would I want it on my phone! At least give us the option to turn it off

author: Thomas Hallén
comment: This app cannot condense folders like Outlook 365 or regular Outlook can. A real pain if you work with a lot of sub-folders

author: Craig Chladny
comment: SO hate the addition of displaying emails in time "groups". I don't use that on desktop Outlook and it's annoying here too.

author: Rishon Kimber
comment: No unread messages Badge on Androids... the only downfall on this email app.

author: Francis Patrick Murphy
comment: The best mail app and well-integrated to Office 365 on PC. has every feature you could wish for. Can be tricky to set up multiple accounts but once done works perfectly. Excellent for business or individuals who like to be organized.

author: Scott Bonacker
comment: Fantastic, key component of the mobile business life, absolutely essential for staying in contact with family and business contacts on a constant basis. Speedy response to anything that demands attention now. With this mobile tool you have the ability to put out fires while you get to the big hardware and solve the  problem once and for all.
Works great, no issues. Maybe they could put the number of unread inbox messages on the icon, like Clock has the time, and Calendar has the date.

author: Debapriyo Hazra
comment: One of the most user friendly mail apps. The ease of access makes it one of better suited apps on android. Simple interface and high quality performance.

author: Vinit Darji
comment: Not all mail are visible, mail search is not accurate, can't attach other mail, attachment process is too tidious.

author: Jim Stalewski
comment: Drains battery like crazy.  Didn't always but has for the past few weeks.  Had to uninstall.

author: Brian Chiang
comment: Seems they added auto grouping, like last month, last week, etc... HATE that.. please provide option to turn this off

author: Sumanam Subbarayudu
comment: I don't understand why other than inbox folders are not giving notifications .. been checking manually ..

author: Carey Ramsay
comment: There's no access to attachments when a search is done. The paper clip show's up but no document access when the email is opened. URGENT REPAIR PLEASE. Still not fixed.

author: Roy Harper
comment: Solid email app. I prefer this to the Gmail app where too many legitimate emails go to the spam folder, or a promotional folder.

author: Robbert S
comment: Often doesn't show email and/or calendar events, doesn't sync email and/or calendar events. Force close or even phone reboot required to fix the above. Does not integrate contacts with the dialer. Generally a very bad experience, unfortunately I have to deal with it for work.

author: Hartland Ellis
comment: Its outlook on mobile. Its pretty good and you can read, create and reply to emails.

author: David Huedepohl
comment: Overall very happy. A bit of a learning curve for me but I do like it.

author: Nick Cokkle
comment: Why can't I delete a single email or sent email, instead of the whole email chain, or why can't I break up an email chain to keep the important parts in my inbox, if that can be done it would help me out immensely.

author: Nima Hojat
comment: Great app, though sometimes it lists my teachers emails as others

author: Marcela Rossenckranz
comment: Generally the app is good, organized a and up to date with my stuff, which I like

author: Ellen Burns-Johnson
comment: Ron Swanson review:  This is a good app. It works and isn't too intrusive. It lets me check my email. Thanks. (Now hopefully the app will stop asking me if I want to rate it.)

author: Mohan N.
comment: Worst experience evan i cant deactivate the app

author: Dinah Wray
comment: It also partners with my older emailing version and places each under separate tabs.

author: Brian Baker
comment: Really appreciate this app. It is amazing and free. Love it!

author: sushil raman
comment: Hi Team,  I am receiving a mail for Outlook security team that my account will be lock if I will not update.   Can u please help me out with your security team email I'd so that I can forward that mail
